sentences.english: Hydrotalcite-like compounds are a sort of anionic clays with double-layer structure.
sentences.chinese: 水滑石類化合物是一種具有層狀結構的陰離子粘土。

sentences.english: The cristae of the mitochondria are arranged closely.
sentences.chinese: 線粒體內嵴排列緊密，呈板層狀。

sentences.english: Surface morphologies of coatings prepared by SPPS presented obvious layer structure.
sentences.chinese: SPPS法制備的塗層表面形貌呈現明顯的層狀結構。

sentences.english: The method of preparing crystalline sodium disilicate has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了合成結晶型層狀二聚硅酸鈉的方法。

sentences.english: The preparation of laminated crystalline sodium silicate from flake caustic soda was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 對用片狀燒鹼製備層狀結晶硅酸鈉進行了探討。

sentences.english: The extensional system is a "horizontal layered" thin-skinned tectonics at the crustal scale.
sentences.chinese: 伸展構造是一種“水平層狀的”薄皮構造。

sentences.english: The reflection peaks of XRD pattern confirmed the trioctahedral layer structure of the product.
sentences.chinese: XRD分析表明合成產物具有典型的皁石層狀結構。

sentences.english: Usually, there are densely distributed small instable rocks in a low-angled stratofabric rock slope.
sentences.chinese: 緩傾角層狀巖質邊坡是小危巖體出露的主要坡型之一。

sentences.english: Taoyuan gossan type gold deposit occurs at the upper end of the slant layered pyrite ore body.
sentences.chinese: 桃園鐵帽型金礦產於似層狀硫鐵礦體傾斜上端。

sentences.english: Said tubular or pipe-shaped material is wrapped onto an axis.
sentences.chinese: 上述筒狀或管狀材料合攏成層狀收卷在一個軸上。

sentences.english: The small laminated pink concretions within the glandular lumens are known as corpora amylacea.
sentences.chinese: 腺腔內可見粉紅色層狀的澱粉樣小體。

sentences.english: Steel with lamellar tear resistance is used in oil drilling ships and crude oil production platforms.
sentences.chinese: 耐層狀撕裂鋼用於石油鑽井船和原油生產平臺。

sentences.english: The preparation conditions of laminar sodium silicate were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 就層狀結晶硅酸鈉的製備條件進行了探討。

sentences.english: The total energy of the layered material decreases after intercalation lithium.
sentences.chinese: 在層狀結構材料中嵌入鋰離子，體系總能量降低。

sentences.english: A time domain boundary element model (BEM) is presented for wave propagation problems in layered media.
sentences.chinese: 建立了研究層狀介質波動問題的時域邊界元計算模型。

sentences.english: Anorthosite was coeval with or slightly younger than the hosting layered gabbro.
sentences.chinese: 斜長巖與層狀輝長岩的時代相近或略晚。
